com.yahoo.search.result

Class DefaultErrorHit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.component.provider.FreezableClass
      • com.yahoo.component.provider.ListenableFreezableClass
        • com.yahoo.search.result.Hit
          • com.yahoo.search.result.DefaultErrorHit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Freezable, ListenableFreezable, Data, ErrorHit, Cloneable, Comparable<Hit>

    public class DefaultErrorHit
extends Hit
implements ErrorHit, Cloneable
    A hit which holds information on error conditions in a result. En error hit maintains a main error - the main error of the result.
    Author:
    bratseth, Steinar Knutsen

      • DefaultErrorHit

        public DefaultErrorHit(String source,
                       ErrorMessage error)
        Creates an error hit with a main error
        Parameters:
        source - the name of the source or backend of this hit
        error - an initial main error to add to this hit, cannot be null
